name: Buoyant
description:
How long can you survive in this abstract game of survival? Surf an endless wave, avoiding enemies and collecting rings. Simple one-button gameplay, enjoyable wave physics and a sublime soundtrack combine to make an addictive and challenging score-based game.

Featuring music from Astropilot, Tomas Novoa and more this is gorgeous way to surf an alien seascape whilst competing against your friends on the leaderboards.
